quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Paul Newman and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, newman. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof (1958) was Paul Newmans first movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the name of the salad dressing company that Paul Newman founded?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Newmans Own

questions.question: Paul Newman was an avid golfer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In this movie Paul Newman plays a prisoner in a Florida prison camp who refuses to submit to the system. His last words before being killed were, What weve got here is a failure to communicate.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cool Hand Luke

questions.question: Steve McQueen and Paul Newman never starred in a movie together.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Paul Newmans last film appearance was in 2002s Road to Perdition opposite this actor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Hanks

questions.question: Paul Newman appeared in 13 films with his wife Joanne Woodard, starting in 1958.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: On his first radio show, Red Skelton developed several characters. What was the name he gave to the punch drunk boxer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cauliflower McPugg

questions.question: Paul Newmans last performance in any form turned out to be the narration of this 2007 movie about a race car driver. Who was the movie about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dale Earnhardt

questions.question: What is the name of the character played by Paul Newman in The Long Hot Summer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben Quick

questions.question: Is it true that Red Skelton was born in Vincennes, Iowa?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Which actor comedian spotted Red Skelton selling newspapers and helped him with the start of his career?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed Wynn

questions.question: In what year was Paul Newman born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1925

questions.question: What branch of the military did Paul Newman serve in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Navy

questions.question: In what 1969 film did Paul Newman co-star with Robert Redford?

options.text: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mr. and Cbs
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cannibal, vocalist. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what year did Mr. T get his own cartoon series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1983

questions.question: Mr. T was not hired as a bodyguard for which of these stars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hugh Hefner

questions.question: Red Skelton battled CBS for a while largely because they said he didnt appeal to younger audiences.  Which network picked Red up for a short time after he left CBS?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: NBC

questions.question: Which of Red Skeltons characters was a cabdriver?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clem Kadiddlehopper

questions.question: Red Skeltons show was first aired on TV in 1951. What other comedian got their own CBS TV sitcom start in 1951?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lucille Ball

questions.question: Mr. T was born in 1952 in what major U.S. city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago

questions.question: Where is The Caribe Cannibal heading?

options.text: Off, on an Around the World  Cruise
Off to Dry Dock in Seattle
Off to Barbados, just for the ride
Off to St. Thomas, for a weeks sailing

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Off to Barbados, just for the ride

questions.question: Which of these was NOT one of Mr.Ts occupations before becoming famous?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Construction Worker

questions.question: Who is Jack at the wheel with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His Eurasian Bride

questions.question: What did Red Skelton often say often about his years in WWII?

options.text: Clem was duckin, while Willie was bobbin and weavin.
I was the only celebrity to go in a private and come out a private.
I once had General Bradley laughing so hard, he nearly rolled his Jeep.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I was the only celebrity to go in a private and come out a private.

questions.question: Who is the Special Delivery for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hoops McCann

questions.question: How much do the local boys spend,  just to shine the Silver Bowl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: .25 (one quarter)

questions.question: Well I aint sorry for you no more, ya crazy, psalm-singing, skinny old maid! is a Humphrey Bogart line uttered to Audrey Hepburn in the John Huston masterpiece, The African Queen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who was the regular vocalist on Red Skeltons first radio show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harriet Nelson

questions.question: On a BBC poll, Mr. T was voted as one of the most influential Americans in history. Where did he rank on that poll?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movies and John Wayne

questions.question: The Duke starred with this actress in 5 different movies. She played Martha McCandles, Min Wead, and Mary Kate Danaher.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maureen OHara

questions.question: John Wayne and Robert Mitchum were in only 2 movies together, El Dorado and The Longest Day.  Which of the following John Wayne movies star either one of Mitchums two sons, Michael and James?

options.text: War Wagon, Big Jim McClain, and Big Jake
In Harms Way, McLintock, and Big Jake
Rio Bravo, Rio Grande, Rio Lobo
Chisum, Rio Lobo, and In Harms Way

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chisum, Rio Lobo, and In Harms Way

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Stewart

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vera Miles

options.text: War Wagon and In Harms Way
In Harms Way and The Longest Day

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sands of Iwo Jima  Chisum

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lost in Translation

questions.question: Two of John Waynes seven children were in 10 of their dads movies, as either an actor or producer. Name them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael and Patrick

options.text: Capt. Rockwell Torrey; Spig Wead; Sean Mercer
Sean Mercer; Lt. John McQue; John Mercer

Spig Wead; Ethan Edwards; John Patrick Gilhooley

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Capt. Rockwell Torrey; Spig Wead; Sean Mercer

questions.question: The Duke co-starred with several different screen legends throughout his career. Name his co-star in the movie Fort Apache.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Fonda

Darling, wont you say my name

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Huddleston

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeffrey Leon Bridges
